document_data.title: The Night I Called the Undead Out
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Night I Called the Undead Out''''' is an adventure in the [[Living Forgotten Realms]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 4{{th}} edition.

{{Quote|''You are asked to recover a stolen statue from an abandoned mansion in the Bloomridge neighborhood in Baldur's Gate. What seems to be a simple task quickly turns into a night of terror. The timing of these events seems more than a bit coincidental. Can you protect the locals and still survive long enough to unravel the mystery? A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Baldur's Gate for characters levels 4–7.''}}
